body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**

When I forget quotes around a value, I get an opaque error message:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/251288/195908698-8f7ea6a6-e9b2-43c7-a508-87e60a940160.png)

**Describe the solution you'd like**

An error message like:

```
Invalid List Filter: the right side of `ExecutionStatus = Running` should be a string (needs quotes around it). 
```

**Describe alternatives you've considered**

Server interprets `Running` as `"Running"` and doesn't return error.
title: Return clear error messages for invalid List Filters
